faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We’ve gathered answers to the most common questions our students ask before starting. If you can’t find the info you need — just message us, we’re here to help.
faq.q1: Do I need programming experience to start learning?
faq.a1: No! Our course starts from scratch and walks you through every concept step-by-step, even if you're a complete beginner.
faq.q2: How much time should I dedicate weekly?
faq.a2: Around 10–15 hours per week is ideal. The more time you can invest, the faster your progress.
faq.a3: We teach JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Git, and more — everything needed to land a modern web developer job.
faq.q4: What happens at the end of the course?
faq.a4: You'll build a portfolio, get help with your resume and LinkedIn, and be guided through the job search process.
faq.q5: Do you help with job placement?
faq.a5: Yes — we offer HR support, mock interviews, and a job search strategy tailored to your needs.
faq.a6: Yes! If you complete the course but don't feel satisfied or ready, we offer a money-back guarantee.
